name: Locos Island (Typing Game)
description:
✈ You've crash landed onto an Island and need to find a way back to your plane!

🏝 The Inhabitants' have their own Language. Can you figure out how to talk with the Islanders, defeat the underground ghosts (by typing), and find a way off the Island?

This is a Short, 20 minute, typing game. Designed for people who do NOT know any Japanese.

Languages Used:

  • LoCoS - a Visual Language designed by Yukio Ota from Japan in 1964.
  • Japanese (You're not expected to know the language)

Note: The Mac Version has some Text Alignment issues, but nothing that breaks the game.
